@title CharloDAO
 @author Segun Ogundipe David
@notice Holds all the charity proposals made in the DAO.

@notice This function makes payent to a Charity after the voting period of the proposal. Can only be called by a Stakeholder.
 @param proposalId The id of the proposal to pay to.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only stakeholders are allowed to make payments"

arguments.value: Only stakeholders are allowed to make payments

documentation.text: @notice This function adds a new stakeholder if the total contribution is >= 5 celo

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct CharloDAO.CharityProposal memory[] memory)

params.amount: The amount of celo that was sent.
params.fromAddress: The address the contribution came from.

params.amount: The amount that is requested for.
params.proposer: The address of the contributer/stakeholder that created the proposal.

params.charityAddress: The charity that payment was made to.
params.stakeholder: The stakeholder tha made the payment.

params.description: A brief description of why the proposal should be voted for.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.proposalId: The id of the proposal to pay to.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.proposalId: The id of the charity proposal being voted for.
params.supportProposal: true to vote for and false against.

ContributionReceived(address,uint256).notice: Event that is emitted when a contribution is received.

NewCharityProposal(address,uint256).notice: Event that is emitted when a new proposal is added to the list of proposals.

PaymentTransfered(address,address,uint25.notice: Event that is emitted when payment is made to a charity.

createProposal(string,address,uint256).notice: Adds a new proposal to the `charityProposals` mapping.

makeStakeholder(uint256).notice: This function adds a new stakeholder if the total contribution is >= 5 celo

payCharity(uint256).notice: This function makes payent to a Charity after the voting period of the proposal. Can only be called by a Stakeholder.

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Vote for a particular proposal. Only stakeholders are allowed to vote.
